shows.title: The Spice of Life
shows.desc:
Treat your tastebuds to Anjula’s spice masterclass, and be introduced to the alchemy of her masala dabba (spice box). She’ll create three dishes using one masala base and different ingredients, and each dish will have a unique, mouthwatering flavour.

A respected food writer and author, Chef Anjula Devi is best known for her extensive knowledge of spices and for creating delicious authentic Indian cuisine.
